reviewText: Just a DVD made up of a guy walking around Key West shooting video of men and women who have been body painted and have other "attachments" to their outfits.

This is the first Crazy Chicks DVD I've ever seen, and I'm quite impressed by it. I have seen a good many of these "flashing in public" videos, and this one is definitely above average. There are LOTS of really hot babes on here, and NO cold ones at all. Usually women on here are showing their breasts, but several show more. The editing and camera-work are above average too, with steadier cameras than is often the case. Also, many of these types of videos include numerous shots that should have been left out, but this one has virtually no bad footage. There are a few shots that are a little out of focus, but that's rare. I like too how the production crew decided to switch back and forth from street scenes to scenes inside clubs, usually with girls dancing on stage, which provides more variety. And if you like body painting, a lot of the ladies have all kinds of interesting designs painted on them. I've heard that women in Key West often walk around nude covered with body painting, and this DVD makes it look like that's probably true. There are also a few speeded-up scenes of women getting paint-jobs done to them. Since I find body painting really sexy I pushed this DVD on up to 5 stars. Also, there's a bonus of Peach girl Tanya James doing a strip-tease, and it's quite hot, but runs just about 5 minutes. And there are enticing trailers from 4 other sexy Peach films. The whole DVD runs about 60 minutes, and this series is decently priced too. You can bet I'll be searching for more Crazy Chicks.

Ok, this was filmed on locations around Key West, on the street and both inside and outside of clubs...a video like the other ones advertised on late night tv.  Lots of brief shots, some if you blink you will miss!  BUT, the cute babes featured on the cover show everything in between the location shots AND you get to see Tanya James...be careful, both this cutey and the two on the cover are extra HOT!
